name: The Haunting Of Caroline Ward
description:
You play as Billie Graham, a freelancer open to do almost anything for money. After you receive an interesting offer, you decide to take the job. Explore White Mountain Sanatorium, and do your best to make it out ALIVE!

W, A, S, D - Movement

E - To pick up notes.

Submission for the Bit Byte 4 : Haunted Game Jam. It's my second game, and first time building through WebGL. Please let me know how I can improve, to make this, and future games a better experience! - Josh
